title: Rust running on every GPU
author: littlestymaar
aiHeadline: Rust is now running on every GPU, because clearly the world needed another way to make graphics cards cry in silence.

title: CCTV footage captures video of an earthquake fault in motion
author: chrononaut
aiHeadline: CCTV footage captures earthquake fault in motion, proving that even the Earth itself is just a giant camera-ready prop waiting for its close-up.

title: How We Rooted Copilot
author: uponasmile
aiHeadline: Researchers successfully rooted Copilot, demonstrating once again that no AI is safe from humans who really, really want to break things.

title: Test Results for AMD Zen 5
author: matt_d
aiHeadline: AMD Zen 5 test results reveal groundbreaking performance improvements, because apparently we all need our gaming PCs to be just a tiny bit more overpowered.

title: Ageing accelerates around age 50 ― some organs faster than others
author: rntn
aiHeadline: Ageing accelerates around age 50, with some organs taking the lead in the race to remind you that midlife is not just a crisis—it's a full-body revolt.
